title: Middle East Respiratory Syndrome Coronavirus Infection in Dromedary Camels in Saudi Arabia
body:
Volume 5, no. 2, doi:10.1128/mBio.00884-14, 2014. Author Peter D. Burbelo’s name was inadvertently omitted. The byline and affiliation line should appear as shown above. Also, the following statement should be added to Acknowledgments:

Work in the Dental Clinical Research Core (P. D. Burbelo) was supported by the intramural research program of the National Institute of Dental and Craniofacial Research, NIH.
